availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert H. Haden, Sr. (Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane E. Haden. Father of Indiana E. Haden, Lewis G. Haden, Mary C. Haden, Eugene S. Haden, Joseph T. Haden, William H. Haden, Francis R. Haden, John R. Haden, and Robert H. Haden, Jr. Carpenter in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Employed S. Hargus as carpenter and T. J. Spence as an apprentice in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 24A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 3-4.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 295A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, Subdistrict 150, p. 59A.
